description: The Tomb: Team leader Jeff Allen stumbles across a cragged cave -he has found the entrance to the tomb! And now, dear reader, preparefor the most breathtaking visual ever filmed! Inside the tomb, richesabound, but this treasure is guarded by a nubian prince with the finestebony of all time in the form of Simon Cox. Special effects bring thestatue to life and Simon quickly wrestles Allen to the ground. Buttables turn fast and Simon gets Allen's cock up his round ass in apounding scene that delivers everything you expect.
title: Raiders Of The Lost Arse
